message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $120?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see the value of the product is $150 to you, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $165.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle at $140?  That's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'll offer it to you for $155.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me, but I need to be mindful of my budget. $145 is my final offer.

I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'll offer it to you for $152.50. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
